Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Finding/Finding by Site or System/Cardiovascular System Finding/Aneurysm/Aortic Aneurysm/Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm
Cardiovascular Diseases/Vascular Diseases/Aortic Diseases/Aortic Aneurysm/Aortic Aneurysm, Abdominal
Record.Description: An abnormal balloon- or sac-like dilatation in the wall of the ABDOMINAL AORTA which gives rise to the visceral, the parietal, and the terminal (iliac) branches below the aortic hiatus at the diaphragm.
